name: Blinker
description:
My submission for the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam 2019.

The theme was "only one," and what that referred to was up to interpretation.

In Blinker, you control a little fella who has a very selective sight.  Namely, he can only see one type of obstacle at a time (or himself!), which can be changed with the number keys.

Just get to the trophy without getting ded.

(There's no sound, but eh, 48 hours, what can you do?)

Made with Unreal Engine 4 and paint.net.
